login.title: Login

google.title: Google Apps Login
google.line1: This feature is for Google Apps for Work users, who have their work domain name managed by Google Apps.
google.line2: Whether or not you already have a Tatami account, you can sign in with your Google Apps account.
google.line3: Your email will be provided by Google and your email's domain name will be used to allow you to join your company's private space.
google.link: For more information on Google Apps for Work click here.

register.title: Register
register.line1: A confirmation email will be sent to the address you provide.
register.line2: Your email's domain will determine the company space you join. For example, users with an email@ippon.fr address will join Ippon's private space.
register.line3: If you are the first employee of your company to join Tatami, your company's private space will be automatically created.

error.authentication: Failed to sign in! Please check your credentials and try again.
